item.title: How u make an npc say when ur on and not on?
item.dc:creator: @Pizz4_0wnz Pizz4 0wnz
item.description:
@Pizz4_0wnz wrote:

i can tell you hold on[br][size=1]Posted on: September 18, 2007, 08:00:18 PM[/size][hr]Ok… go to npchandler.java and search for moo then under moo add this

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) {
if (misc.random2(25) == 3) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “TEXTHERE”

Then for making say your online or not you can add this same folder…(npchandler.java) you add this

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) {

if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“YOURUSERHERE”)){
npcs[i].textUpdate = “YOURTEXT”;
}
else{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “YOURTEXT”;
}
}
}

There you go hope it helped

Read full topic
